alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 1:54PM MST until March 30 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MST /3 AM MDT/ TO 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ THURSDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...A cold front will bring a period of steady snow to the region in the early morning hours Thursday. Snow will become more showery later Thursday morning, before heavier showers develop again Thursday afternoon and Thursday evening. Snow levels will fall as low as 4500 feet through the day Thursday, but most accumulation will be above 6000 feet. Expect southwest winds gusting from 40 to 45 mph at times. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Grand Canyon, Jacob Lake and North Rim. * WHEN...From 2 AM MST /3 AM MDT/ to 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will especially impact driving conditions early Thursday morning and Thursday evening. Snow forecast from 2 AM Thursday to 8 PM Thursday: Grand Canyon 1 to 2 inches Jacob Lake 2 to 4 inches North Rim 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons
